description: One-piece full grain water resistant leather upper that offers comfort and protection while the Gore-Tex Performance Comfort Footwear lining guarantees waterproofness and breathability. Co-injected two-density polyurethane midsole gives comfort, stability and cushioning. High-tech Asolo/Vibram Triple Power Structure outsole, stands out for its three shock absorbers at the points of greatest impact with the ground, has a self-cleaning design and offers grip and precision in all types of terrains. The Micro Pully System lacing system ensures a fast, precise and customizable lace up.
name: Asolo TPS 520 GV MM - Mens
